item.title: By: yisraelmedad
item.dc:creator: yisraelmedad
item.description: "the mekhina in Elie", should be Eli (as in its official site: http://www.bneidavid.org/Web/en/default.aspx). As an historical footnot, the approach taken by Shabtei Ben-Dov in his article in "Sullam" in 1962, if I recall correctly, to create a Yeshiva that the State required should be included in any academic study of the mechinot phenomenon. As for the so-called secular mechinot, or the mixed ones, like Ein Prat, I presume some PhD candidate is working on those.
